description: The original intention of Huaxia token is to combine blockchain technology and work of art  to prohibit a series of problems such as false work, unreasonable high price, difficult management, not traceability and so on on the basis of decentralization, blockchain and intelligent protocol. The traceability of blockchain technology supply the solution for the information transparence of work of art and historical relic during the dealing process.
name: Huaxia Token
